item.title: Analyst: Over the past year, BTC whales have locked in significant profits, but strong demand from new entrants has supported the market's continued growth
item.description: On July 31st, CryptoQuant analyst Axel released data on social media, stating that over the past year, large holders have locked in substantial profits. Whale addresses holding more than 1000 bitcoins have seen a decrease of 502,000 bitcoins. Meanwhile, institutional investor demand has played a supporting role in market resilience and continued growth. In essence, over the past year, we have constantly witnessed strong demand for tokens from newly entered funds.

item.title: Fosun-backed Finloop Completes Multi-Million Dollar Series A Funding Round with Participation from Solana Foundation
item.description: On July 31st, according to Finloop, a technology firm under Fosun's Star Road Technology. It has recently completed a nearly multimillion-dollar Series A financing round. The investors include the Solana Foundation and other Web3 industry organizations.This round of financing will be utilized to swiftly build and enhance the company's Web5 new business ecosystem - RWA (Real World Assets). It will also enhance its comprehensive ability to integrate fiat currency, stablecoins, and digital assets. Furthermore, it will provide financial institutions with a one-stop technology solution that connects the traditional financial and digital asset worlds.According to the introduction, the strategic concept of Star Road Technology is based on Web5. Its business model mainly supports B2B service platforms for all types of financial products. It achieves this by supporting full-category products from Web2 (such as cash management, public funds, private funds, bonds, bills, insurance, etc.) and

item.title: Letsbonk.fun Founder: Will Focus on Technical Improvements Before Entering the Next Growth Stage
item.description: On July 31st, Tom, the founder of Letsbonk.fun, posted on Platform X. He stated that the anticipated release time of a key update that users had been eagerly awaiting had been postponed. He cited issues that had been encountered and various interferences. Currently, the team has made considerable progress and will give priority to ensuring that the technical aspects meet the standards before moving on to the next growth phase.

item.title: Security Company Check Point: Beware of JSCEAL Malware Activity Targeting Cryptocurrency Users
item.description: July 31st. Check Point, a security company, announced that its researchers have recently uncovered a large-scale malicious campaign named JSCEAL. Attackers exploited the Node.js platform by using compiled JavaScript files to target cryptocurrency users. This campaign has been active since March 2024. Attackers have been luring users into downloading and installing malicious programs that pose as nearly 50 mainstream cryptocurrency trading apps through fake advertisements.In the first half of 2025, approximately 35,000 malicious ads were related to this campaign, and there were millions of impressions in the EU alone. The attack process is multi-layered with strong anti-detection capabilities. It is capable of stealing user credentials, wallets, and other sensitive information. It also has functions such as remote control, keylogging, and browser traffic hijacking. The research emphasized that this malicious program has a very low detection rate, and some variants have remained undete

item.title: The Whale Address Group Holding 10 to 10,000 BTC has accumulated an additional 218,500 BTC since the end of March.
item.description: On July 31st, the crypto market analysis firm Santiment posted on social media that since the end of March, wallet addresses holding between 10 and 10,000 bitcoins have accumulated an extra 218,570 bitcoins. These key holder groups are currently in control of 68.44% of the total Bitcoin supply, and their holdings have increased by approximately 0.9% during this period.

item.title: BNKR-Associated Token TN100x Surpasses $5 Million Market Cap Briefly, with a 138% 24-Hour Gain
item.description: On July 31st, according to GMGN market data, the market capitalization of the BNKR-related token TN100x briefly exceeded 5 million US dollars, with a 24-hour increase of 138% and a total of 22,077 holding addresses.BNKR and TN100x developers are both reported to be the deployer (@0xDeployer). BankrCoin (BNKR) was listed on Coinbase yesterday, with a 24-hour increase of 46.18% and the market capitalization briefly exceeding 90 million US dollars. The deployer also mentioned plans to share 40% of Bankr's revenue with TN100x stakers.

item.title: The Whale Address Reinvests $3.16M to Buy 1.06B PUMP Tokens
item.description: On July 31, according to the monitoring of LookOnChain, the whale address beginning with 8RwxXR, which had previously lost $125,000 on PUMP, spent another 17,542 SOL tokens (approximately $3.16 million) two hours ago to acquire 1.06 billion PUMP tokens at an average price of $0.00297.

item.title: 「Big Brother Whale」 Huang Lizheng Just Liquated His 5x Long PUMP Position, Realizing a Loss of $4.47 Million
item.description: On July 31st, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, although the price of PUMP is on the rise, "Brother Ma Ji" Huang Licheng is currently liquidating his long PUMP position at a loss.His current long PUMP (5x) position still holds 4.175 billion PUMP (approximately $13.3 million), with an unrealized loss of $4.47 million.

item.title: BlackRock's ETHA holds $11.32 billion worth of ETH, representing 2.46% of the ETH supply.
item.description: On July 31st, based on Arkham data, BlackRock's Ethereum spot ETF ETHA has accumulated buy orders amounting to $375 million of ETH this week. Currently, ETHA holds $11.32 billion worth of ETH, accounting for 2.46% of the ETH supply.

item.title: 《Content Coin: Hype, Hope, or the Creator Economy's Second Wind?》 Theme Space tonight at 9:00 PM in Launch
item.description: In a recent report by BlockBeats, the rapidly increasing popularity of Zora has ignited a heated debate within the Solana and Base communities, once again shining a spotlight on Content Coins. On the evening of July 31 at 9:00 PM, BlockBeats collaborated with the emerging social protocol Trends and the in-depth podcast Web3 101 to jointly host a Space event with the theme "Content Coin: Hype, Hope, or the Second Spring of the Creator Economy?".The event featured a panel of veteran industry content creators: Mable, the founder of Trends; Edison, the founder of Tako Protocol; Liu Feng, a partner at BODL Ventures; Wang Chao, a crypto and AI researcher; and Carl, the head of business at NAVI Protocol. Together, they discussed the new trends in the creator economy behind the Solana and Base dispute, analyzing the potential and challenges of Content Coins. Join us for this discussion and explore the next opportunities in the Web3 content ecosystem.Space: https://x.com/i/spaces/1vA
